SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.controller

Interface ClientActions

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientController
public interface ClientActions
This interface represents all methods/actions that can be invoked from clients

  • Method Details

    • connect

      void connect(String username)
      Handles the connection of the client.
      Parameters:
      username - the client's name.

    • placeCard

      void placeCard(int cardHandPosition, Side selectedSide, Position position) throws Playground.UnavailablePositionException, Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException, InvalidGamePhaseException, SuspendedGameException, RemoteException
      Places the cardHandPosition on the selectedSide and position specified.
      Parameters:
      cardHandPosition - the position of the card in the player's hand.
      selectedSide - of the card.
      position - in the playground at which it will be placed.
      Throws:
      Playground.UnavailablePositionException - if the position isn't empty or isn't contained in the player's playground.
      Playground.NotEnoughResourcesException - if the resources needed to place the card aren't enough.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow placing cards.
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • draw

      void draw(int IdToDraw) throws InvalidGamePhaseException, EmptyDeckException, NotExistingFaceUp, SuspendedGameException, RemoteException, InvalidIdForDrawingException
      Draws a card from the IdToDraw.
      Parameters:
      IdToDraw - the id representing the deck or any of the face up cards positions.
      Throws:
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game doesn't allow to draw cards.
      EmptyDeckException - in the event that the selected deck is empty.
      NotExistingFaceUp - if the face up slot is empty.
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
      InvalidIdForDrawingException - if the id of the card isn't valid.

    • placeStarter

      void placeStarter(Side side) throws SuspendedGameException, RemoteException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the starter card of the player in the chosen side.
      Parameters:
      side - the side of the starter card.
      Throws:
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow placing cards.

    • chooseColor

      void chooseColor(PlayerColor color) throws InvalidColorException, SuspendedGameException, RemoteException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Assigns color to the mainPlayerUsername.
      Parameters:
      color - chosen by the mainPlayerUsername.
      Throws:
      InvalidColorException - if the color has already been selected.
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow to choose the color.

    • placeObjectiveCard

      void placeObjectiveCard(int chosenObjective) throws SuspendedGameException, RemoteException, InvalidGamePhaseException
      Places the chosenObjective from one of the two available.
      Parameters:
      chosenObjective - the chosen objective.
      Throws:
      SuspendedGameException - if the game is suspended.
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
      InvalidGamePhaseException - if the game phase doesn't allow to place the objective card.

    • sendMessage

      void sendMessage(Message message) throws InvalidMessageException, RemoteException
      Sends message from the mainPlayerUsername.
      Parameters:
      message - sent by the mainPlayerUsername.
      Throws:
      InvalidMessageException - if the author doesn't match the author or the recipient doesn't exist
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.

    • setPlayersNumber

      void setPlayersNumber(int playersNumber) throws RemoteException, InvalidPlayersNumberException
      Sets the number of players allowed in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - the number of players of the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
      InvalidPlayersNumberException - if the size is greater than 4 or less than 2

    • disconnect

      void disconnect(String username) throws RemoteException
      Disconnects the username from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - in the event of an error occurring during the execution of a remote method.
